Description: Fragment of wall of North Ionian pottery bowl; glaze fired orange-brown; inside glazed with added red band lined in white; exterior: two bands on mid wall, one at foot; incised inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 66, no. 814, pl. XXI, no. 814)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 688, no. 462)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.382)
